segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn’t notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to turn around and see the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching for those cookies—he must really want one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, like she knows he’ll share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s kind of sweet how they’re working together to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, but he seems confident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it—it’s kind of fun to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely clueless, and it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR
